name: Trianglebot
description: Pull contact info from a Google Sheet and serve it to Groupme on demand. Built for http://triangleumn.com

GROUPME_BOT_ID.description: Your Groupme bot ID. Get this at https://dev.groupme.com/bots

BOT_NAME.description: The name the bot will listen for when performing searches.

DOCUMENT_KEY.description: The ID of the Google Sheets document with your data. You can find the key in your browser's URL: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/<THIS_PART_IS_YOUR_DOCUMENT_KEY>/edit

WORKSHEET_KEYS.description: The keys for the worksheets to read from, comma separated. Example: "od6,od4,od7". od6 is the default sheet. Learn more: http://damolab.blogspot.com/2011/03/od6-and-finding-other-worksheet-ids.html

HOMEPAGE.description: Redirect HTTP GET requests to this URL.
